context: Booking Holdings Inc. is a online travel and reservation platform focused on Booking.com, Priceline, Kayak, and OpenTable. Connected trip platform. AI concierge and personalized travel recommendations.

competitors.name: Expedia Group
competitors.notes: Major OTA with Expedia, Vrbo, Hotels.com brands

competitors.name: Google Travel
competitors.notes: AI-powered travel planning threatening traditional OTAs

competitors.name: Trip.com Group
competitors.notes: Global OTA with strong Asia presence

competitors.name: Hopper
competitors.notes: AI travel app with price freeze and fintech products

competitors.name: Kayak/Momondo
competitors.notes: Own metasearch brands competing with Google
